lore.modfest.music.antiquity: Hint #1 - Visit a forgotten museum, then return to where you started it all.
lore.modfest.music.hand_me_down: Hint #2 - A strange fellowship gathers at the center of it all, but you're usually above all that.
lore.modfest.music.advent: Hint #3 - "Come in Agent 3 - Once Flounder Heights is secure, be sure to scout your surroundings! Captain, out."
lore.modfest.music.booyah: Hint #4 - Would you be so kind as to find this next song?
lore.modfest.music.three: Hint #5 - Some music can only exist in a box, and it becomes a climb to find its tune.
modfest.music.the_six_sides_of_the_dice: Aethyus - The Six Sides of the Dice (Jukebox)
modfest.music.stereo.the_six_sides_of_th: Aethyus - The Six Sides of the Dice
lore.modfest.music.the_six_sides_of_the_: Hint #6 - You'll have to build this castle brick by brick! luckily, you'll have some instructions...
lore.modfest.music.interloc: Hint #7 - I love to throw mud and rocks into my jukebox. It makes me so happy i could jump backwards while endlessly gaining speed!
lore.hyper_silt.hyper_silt: Hint #8 - A magical flying minecart can take you anywhere from B to T!
lore.modfest.music.notholirion: Hint #9 - A short walk from deadly minigame, you'll find that somebunny loves to snack!
lore.modfest.music.timeout: Hint #10 - Visit a forgotten meseum, then, under silt and clay, follow visions of a a strange purple being.
modfest.music.how_i_dance: Nulb - And This Is How I Dance (Jukebox)
modfest.music.stereo.how_i_dance: Nulb - And This Is How I Dance
lore.modfest.music.how_i_dance: Hint #11 - Visit a forgotten museum, then capture the visage of the foremost artist
lore.modfest.music.ivory_throne: Hint #12 - Among the bleachers at a clash of primary colour.
lore.modfest.music.siege: Hint #13 - A selfish thought finds your soul in reverie. Grand, or even Indestructible, behind that fa√ßade is nothing but an image of an image.
lore.occmy.disk_nullity: Hint #14 - Underground ROCK classics can only be found if you're on the inside. Follow the light, and you'll find the music in your heart.
lore.modfest.music.childhood_promises: Hint #15 - Explore inanimateness, then revisit a museum's gift shop.
lore.occmy.disk_grounding: Hint #16* - Persistence is the key to artistry!
lore.modfest.music.tilapia: Hint #17* - A simple gift from your bony friend.
